channel.title: Reaped people can't be forced to vote, yet Chilled people can
channel.description:
This is an awkward mechanic and I think it needs to be fixed to be consistent. Either both chilled and reaped people can be forced to vote, or neither can.
Also and more importantly I believe that using force vote on a reaped player should **NOT** consume a use of political pressure. At the moment it wastes your ability. I would like instead to get a notification that the player is reaped.

item.title: Reaped people can't be forced to vote, yet Chilled people can
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
It at least buffs noble a tiny bit
